1.title: Episode #9.1
1.plot: A distraught Aled faces a hearing at school and anger from the community - and staff members. Ceri and Steph try to support him. Annest starts maternity leave, and her cover arrives at the worst moment.

2.title: Episode #9.2
2.plot: Two months later, and Beth, Gwyn's wife, joins the staff while their son Bleddyn starts Year 10. Math is promoted to head of sixth form, but Colin, Annest and Aled are not back at work. Ceri receives a threatening letter.

3.title: Episode #9.3
3.plot: Math has some budget ideas and Eurig feels left out. Annest claims she's ready to return to work, but Steph isn't as sure. Bleddyn is being harassed and Nicky suggests setting up a support system at the school.

4.title: Episode #9.4
4.plot: Macs goes to extreme lengths to feel better about himself and worries Nicky. Ceri gives evidence in Aled's trial but the threats against them escalate.

5.title: Episode #9.5
5.plot: Aled goes on the stand at his trial. Mei's rowdy niece shows up at the school. Math and Annest find it difficult to communicate. Steph visits Llywela, who's recovering at home, and learns some surprising details about her.

6.title: Episode #9.6
6.plot: Math returns home in the morning and finds that Annest has left. Llywela returns to work. Beth decides to join Ceri on the 5K running challenge in place of Aled.

7.title: Episode #9.7
7.plot: A new student teacher arrives, a familiar face to Math - who's just announced his and Annest's wedding is back on. Donna and Eurig clash over plans to raise funds for Macsen. Dylan and Lucy discover some truths at a sex education class.

8.title: Episode #9.8
8.plot: Lucy breaks up with Dylan in public. Bledd sneaks alcohol to school. Preparations are made for Annest and Math's hen/stag parties - and those end up very different evenings.

9.title: Episode #9.9
9.plot: Nicky's world is turned up side down. Colin is scheduled for a home visit on the day of the wedding and Donna stresses over preparing. Twm visits the school.

10.title: Episode #9.10
10.plot: On the day of the wedding, Math can't handle his guilty conscience anymore, while Bledd and Kayleigh struggle with their own. Steph visits Eurig in hospital. Dylan goes alone to see his dad.

1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: The drama continues at Ysgol Gyfun Porth Glo as the aftermath of the crash unfolds. Steph struggles to deal with the sudden death of her mother, whilst Mr. Bell is still trying to stamp his authority. Dalia and Iwan return to a cold reception.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: Chaotic scenes at the school as it undergoes big changes to it's software systems. Steph receives some surprising news, and questions her future at Porth Y Glo which upsets Mei. Annest has made a big effort for Aled's return home, but where is Ceri?

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: Mei is covering Donna as the face of Porth y Glo, Steph is impressed with his Welsh. Aled receives a warm welcome on his return to school. Preparations begin for the Christmas show, Cadi offers her support to Annest but is quickly re-buffed. Nicky tells Dylan she'd like to take their relationship further, but is he ready?

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: Llywela has decided to take the state of the garden into her own hands, but what will Steph say? The situation between Aled and Annest grows increasingly awkward, is she really pregnant? Math's suspicions about Rowan are confirmed, but has he crossed the line?

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot:

1.title: Episode #8.1
1.plot: Five months after the dramatic events of the series 7 finale, the students are preparing for exam season, while the teachers deal with the aftermath of the attack - and some new relationships.

2.title: Episode #8.2
2.plot: Stephanie attends her brother's plea hearing. Donna and Colin celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary. Math prepares his Mathletes team.

3.title: Episode #8.3
3.plot: Annest has a health scare, and asks Aled take her to the hospital as Math can't be reached. Stephanie tries to avoid Llywela after Mei's discoveries.

4.title: Episode #8.4
4.plot: The chief inspection team visits the school on the same day of the class trip for Ceri and Aled's classes and of the Mathletes tournament.

5.title: Episode #8.5
5.plot: Gwenno tries to contact Llywela, who's taken time off school. Aled continues to deny he's taking painkillers, but Ceri doesn't believe him.

6.title: Episode #8.6
6.plot: Annest worries as the date of the birth nears. Steph has to ask Llywela back to work to fill in for Aled. Dylan realises that Macsen and Nicky are in touch again, while Lucas breaks up with Carla.

7.title: Episode #8.7
7.plot: On the last day of the school year, Ceri's photo is circulated around the school. Annest feels Math is avoiding her. Dylan and Macsen get into a fight.

8.title: Episode #8.8
8.plot: On exam day, Steph has to deal with the aftermath of the photo scandal, and Nicky tries to get revenge on Dylan. Math gets surprising news. Aled reaches out to Annest.

9.title: Episode #8.9
9.plot: Macs and Dylan continue to fight, with Donna torn between the two and Colin ignoring the situation. Ceri has her disciplinary hearing with the board of governors. Steph refuses Llywela's attempts to reconcile.

10.title: Episode #8.10
10.plot: Summer Fair - and Annest's last day - finally arrives, with all staff on hand, until Math leaves early for his interview, Ceri feels unwelcome, and Colin doesn't return from a restocking errand.

imdb.title: Gwaith/Cartref
plot: A series set in the fictional school of Ysgol Porth y Glo, following the ups and downs of both staff and students::alunsaunders
